revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR840N |revision=v4 (EU) |series=N300 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=12/01/2016 |fcc_id=TE7WR841NV13 |pcb_id=2050500850 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N;MEDIATEK, MT7628NN, 1706-AJCSL, EAP0W363; |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64B |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N;MEDIATEK, MT7628NN, 1706-AJCSL, EAP0W363; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 4.3.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F4:F2:6D,18:D6:C7 |oui_eth=F4:F2:6D,18:D6:C7 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR840N.html Product page] {{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/TL-WR840N.html Support page] {{•}} [https://emulator.tp-link.com/EMULATOR_wr840nv4_eu/index.htm Demo UI]
"2050500850" and "1642" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3214016 FCC photos]. {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR841N v13.x}}
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr840n ''TP-LINK TL-WR840N (EU) v4'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=70687 ''OpenWrt on TL-WR841N v13 or TL-WR840N v4'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :<small>'''Note''': TL-WR840N v4 have 5 leds: power, wifi, lan (one led for all ports), wan, lock(wps). :TL-WR841N v13 have 8 leds: power, wifi, lan4, lan3, lan2, lan1, wan, lock(wps).</small> :[https://github.com/lede-project/source/pull/974/commits/8706b608f4848940275cdb523e6bb85705769728 ''ramips: add initial support for TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4''] :Specification: :- SoC: MediaTek MT7628NN (580MHz) :- RAM: 64 MiB (Winbond W9751G6JB-25) :- Flash: 8 MiB (GigaDevice GD25Q64CSIG) :- LAN: 4x 100M :- WAN: 1x 100M :- Antennas: 2x non-detachable :- LED: 5x green :- Buttons: 1x reset *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/support-for-tl-wr840n-es-ver-5-0-eu/6281/5 ''Support for TL-WR840N (ES) Ver 5.0 (EU)'' on '''LEDE''' forums] :*[[TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4]] ::CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628NN @575MHz ::Flash: ''GigaDevice'' GD25Q64B (8MB) ::RAM: ''Winbond'' W9751G6KB-25 (64MB) :*[[TP-LINK TL-WR840N v5]] ::CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628NN @575MHz ::Flash: ''GigaDevice'' GD25Q32B (4MB) ::RAM: ''ESMT'' M14D5121632A (64MB)
<!--840V4 CPU MEDIATEK MT7628NN 1706-AJCSL EAP0W363 RAM 512MB WINBOND W9751G6KB-25
840V5 CPU MEDIATEK MT7628NN 1710-AJCSL EAP0X331 RAM 512MB ESMT M14D5121632A
*[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=786959&st=840 ''TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4'' on '''4pda''' forums] (RU) -->
